title: Spiritual Cleanse: Detox the Mind, Body and Spirit with Hypnosis
author: Dr William White
description: Check out this great listen on Audible.com. You may have heard how great detoxing your body can be for your health, but the same can be said about detoxing your mind. A spiritual cleanse that detoxes the mind, body, and soul can help to heal emotional wounds, declutter the mind, and clear away acc...

By: [Joel Thompson](/search?searchAuthor=Joel+Thompson&ref=a_pd_Spirit_c5_adblp13npsbx_1_4_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=X785A54TJ8SCCYCY27QD&pageLoadId=XwZCIeFVYyN0Ep5T&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1) - Guided Meditation for Insomnia, Anxiety and Stress Relief - Heal Yourself with Deep Hypnosis Relaxation, Learn to Let Go and Get a Great Nights Sleep - By: Miss Mindfulness - Narrated by: Tamme Buckner - Length: 2 hrs - Original Recording - Overall - Performance - Story Do you always feel stressed? Are you always anxious about the future? Do you feel like your brain never turns off? Stop right there. Take a second and take a deep breath. We are about to embark on a life-changing journey. When it comes to relaxing and resting the body, most people do this quite well. However, when it comes to relaxing the mind, many individuals struggle and cannot seem to give the mind the relaxation it needs. So, make sure you have got yourself a nice pair of headphones or earphones, tuck yourself into bed, close your eyes, and prepare for a new world of relaxation. - - Relaxation medicine - By Fortune on 01-10-20 By: [Miss Mindfulness](/search?searchAuthor=Miss+Mindfulness&ref=a_pd_Spirit_c5_adblp13npsbx_1_5_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=X785A54TJ8SCCYCY27QD&pageLoadId=XwZCIeFVYyN0Ep5T&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1) - Spiritual Healing - Practice Energy Healing, Increase Mindfulness and Conduct an Energy Body Scan - By: InnerPeace Productions - Narrated by: InnerPeace Productions - Length: 2 hrs and 57 mins - Original Recording - Overall - Performance - Story Checking in with your body through meditation can help you ease stress, increase awareness of your true state of mind and help you feel more connected to your body. Mansfield on 03-31-19 By: [Joel Thompson](/search?searchAuthor=Joel+Thompson&ref=a_pd_Spirit_c5_adblp13npsbx_2_1_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=X785A54TJ8SCCYCY27QD&pageLoadId=XwZCIeFVYyN0Ep5T&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1) - Meditations for PTSD - 7 Guided Meditation Scripts for Overcoming Anxiety, Stress, Panic Attacks, Healing Your Inner Child, and Deep Sleep - By: Shivani Batra - Narrated by: Alyssa Rhoads - Length: 5 hrs and 6 mins - Unabridged - Overall - Performance - Story Meditation is one of the most popular forms of complimentary therapy for mental, emotional, and physical conditions on the planet. And when it comes to PTSD, its effectiveness is no different. Meditations can help with things such as reducing stress levels and improving sleep. Science and medicine are on the side of meditation. But even if you're still skeptical, what do you have to lose? - - It taught me forgiveness - By Deanna H. Swartz on 08-09-21 By: [Shivani Batra](/author/Shivani-Batra/B08599JGV3?ref=a_pd_Spirit_c5_adblp13npsbx_2_2_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=X785A54TJ8SCCYCY27QD&pageLoadId=XwZCIeFVYyN0Ep5T&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1) - Guided Meditation for Anxiety - Mindfulness and Breathing Exercises for Relaxing While Your Sleep, Relaxation, Anxiety & Stress Relief, Overcoming Trauma, Self-Help, Gaining Positive Energy & Healing - By: Joel Thompson - Narrated by: Craig Bowles, Dalton Reuter - Length: 3 hrs and 44 mins - Original Recording - Overall - Performance - Story These guided meditations and prompts unlock the powers of your subconscious mind, so you can experience lucid dreaming and astral projection. Drifting first into a near sleep state of relaxation, your mind opens with the help of this guided meditation. Through simply listening and observing your mind and body, you can easily enter a lucid dream state. You'll also be taught how to memorize your dreams, so you can reenter them the next night. - - Really helpful for me! - By Lettie Manigault on 02-12-19 By: [Joel Thompson](/search?searchAuthor=Joel+Thompson&ref=a_pd_Spirit_c5_adblp13npsbx_2_3_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=X785A54TJ8SCCYCY27QD&pageLoadId=XwZCIeFVYyN0Ep5T&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1) - Anxiety Relief Now - Guided Meditation and Self Hypnosis for Instant Anxiety Relief and Stress Reduction - By: Instant Therapy Guru - Narrated by: Instant Therapy Guru - Length: 5 hrs and 43 mins - Original Recording - Overall - Performance - Story This meditation bundle is designed to instantly relieve stress and anxiety while increasing positive emotions. - - Calmed my nerves and soothed me - very decent - By Christie on 01-31-16 - Self Hypnosis Relaxation - Deep Hypnotherapy for Reducing Emotional Pain, Anxiety, Stress & Fear - Move Past Bad Relationships with Sleep Meditation for Energy Healing - By: Joel Thompson - Narrated by: Craig Bowles - Length: 1 hr and 19 mins - Original Recording - Overall - Performance - Story If you are facing difficult emotions right now, it's okay, you are not alone.... You have enormous potential inside you.... Truly infinite universal potential.... These three self-hypnotherapy sessions can guide and help you see beyond negative feelings.... Discover your true, beautiful, self. Unlock the keys to inner peace. And nurture self love, compassion, and healing from within. - - Great relaxation audio - By Heather on 05-10-20 By: [Joel Thompson](/search?searchAuthor=Joel+Thompson&ref=a_pd_Spirit_c5_adblp13npsbx_2_5_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=X785A54TJ8SCCYCY27QD&pageLoadId=XwZCIeFVYyN0Ep5T&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1) - Guided Imagery for Pain Relief - Self-Healing Meditations for Headaches, Back Pain, Muscle Pain, Stomach Aches, Fever, and Bone Injury - By: Shivani Batra - Narrated by: Julie John - Length: 3 hrs and 14 mins - Unabridged - Overall - Performance - Story It is scientifically proven that the mind can't tell the difference between imagined or actual experiences. Guided visualization directs your focus and triggers a health-inducing response or new perspective. Guided therapeutic imagery treats a range of physical issues including muscle pain, headaches, joint pain, fever, back pain, stomach aches, and bone injuries. - - Loving it! - By Betty R. Hall on 05-15-21 By: [Shivani Batra](/author/Shivani-Batra/B08599JGV3?ref=a_pd_Spirit_c5_adblp13npsbx_2_6_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=X785A54TJ8SCCYCY27QD&pageLoadId=XwZCIeFVYyN0Ep5T&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1) - Reiki Healing for Beginners - Unlocking the Secrets of Reiki Self-Healing! Learn Reiki Symbols and Acquire Tips for Reiki Psychic and Reiki Meditations Also Aura Cleanse! - By: Mindfulness Meditation Group - Narrated by: Eric LaCord - Length: 5 hrs and 6 mins - Unabridged - Overall - Performance - Story Do you find yourself lacking mental and physical energy? Are you suffering from stress or anxiety? Is it difficult to find inner gratitude? This audiobook will help you counter these problems by listening to Reiki healing scripts which can help you heal, once and for all. The proven methods and pieces of knowledge are so easy to follow. Even if you've never heard of Reiki healing before, you will still be able to change your life by following the teachings. - - Worst narrator ever! - By Kindle Customer on 09-22-22 - Guided Meditations for Deep Sleep, Relaxation and Stress Relief - Get a Full Night's Rest with Self-Hypnosis Relax Your Mind and Body During Difficult Times and Sleep Smarter - By: Mindfulness Meditation Lifestyle - Narrated by: Caitlin Cavannaugh - Length: 2 hrs and 27 mins - Original Recording - Overall - Performance - Story Guided Meditation for Sleep, Relaxation, and Stress Relief can help you in numerous ways. By going through this practice, you will learn how you can get a full night's rest by relaxing your mind and body during difficult times. Sleep meditation allows you to relax your body and slow down your thoughts so you can get to sleep quicker and easier. - - Annoying and Doesn't Work - By Michael Wiegert on 02-03-20 - Letting Go of the Past - Hypnosis to Heal Your Life, Let Go of the Past and Move On via Relaxing Rain Hypnosis and Meditation - By: Zeta May - Narrated by: Kay Blackburn - Length: 3 hrs and 31 mins - Original Recording - Overall - Performance - Story Clinging to the past can keep you from moving forward in life and robs you of the chance for genuine happiness in the present moment. This hypnosis uses neuro-linguistic programming to help you let go of the past, heal from your wounds and finally move on. This audiobook includes one 19 minute hypnosis with seven background options. It is a part of the Relaxing Rain Hypnosis and Meditation Series. - - good, very good - By Alan on 05-16-18 By: [Zeta May](/search?searchAuthor=Zeta+May&ref=a_pd_Spirit_c5_adblp13npsbx_3_3_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=X785A54TJ8SCCYCY27QD&pageLoadId=XwZCIeFVYyN0Ep5T&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1) - Guided Imagery for Trauma - Self-Healing Meditations for Overthinking, Domestic Abuse, Grief, Bullying, PTSD, and Traumatic Childhood Experiences - By: Shivani Batra - Narrated by: Emerson Wolfe - Length: 3 hrs and 16 mins - Original Recording - Overall - Performance - Story If you're suffering from a past traumatic experience, you've doubtless been presented with a number of possible treatments. Some of these might help, and others, not so much. And some of these treatments will be more involved and expensive than others. Surprisingly, one of the best places to start if you're looking for an alternative route is with guided therapeutic imagery. - - The Power and The Glory - By Melvin Torres on 07-16-21 By: [Shivani Batra](/author/Shivani-Batra/B08599JGV3?ref=a_pd_Spirit_c5_adblp13npsbx_3_4_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=X785A54TJ8SCCYCY27QD&pageLoadId=XwZCIeFVYyN0Ep5T&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1) - 3 in 1: Guided Imagery Meditation Mastery - 20 Scripts for Self-Healing Trauma, Addiction, and Pain with Positive Self-Love Affirmations, Visualizations, and Mindfulness to Live Your Best Life Now - By: Shivani Batra - Narrated by: Julie John, Letizia Turini, Emerson Wolfe - Length: 10 hrs and 32 mins - Unabridged - Overall - Performance - Story It is scientifically proven that the mind can't tell the difference between imagined or actual experiences. Guided visualization directs your focus and triggers a health-inducing response or new perspective.Guided therapeutic imagery can help you recover from a range of addictions from cigarette smoking to binge eating.In 3 in 1: Guided Imagery Meditations, you'll discover: relaxing and effective experiences written and delivered by pros; a guided warm-up proven to calm your mind instantly; and more. By: [Shivani Batra](/author/Shivani-Batra/B08599JGV3?ref=a_pd_Spirit_c5_adblp13npsbx_3_5_1&pf_rd_p=fc97593f-ccc9-4b20-ba92-ec3b392e5863&pf_rd_r=X785A54TJ8SCCYCY27QD&pageLoadId=XwZCIeFVYyN0Ep5T&creativeId=1dfe4386-f6dc-4021-b08a-483cfe6b0bb1) - Intuitive Healing - Meditation Techniques for Spiritual Healing, Opening the Third Eye and Law of Attraction Manifestation via Morning Meditation and Hypnosis - By: InnerPeace Productions - Narrated by: InnerPeace Productions - Length: 3 hrs and 17 mins - Original Recording - Overall - Performance - Story Spiritual enlightenment is a gradual process that happens only when you are ready. These guided meditations are designed to help you spiritually develop, increase inner peace and feel more connected to the universe. - - Love the peace of mind this provides - By Betty Chen on 10-23-16 Publisher's summary You may have heard how great detoxing your body can be for your health, but the same can be said about detoxing your mind. A spiritual cleanse that detoxes the mind, body, and soul can help to heal emotional wounds, declutter the mind, and clear away accumulated baggage. This session is designed to guide you through a spiritual detox - one where you can unload your troubles, declutter, unwind, and let go of any negative emotions. This hypnosis will help you: - Spiritually cleanse the mind, body, and soul - Declutter the mind - Release negative emotions - Heal emotional wounds - Increase your inner peace This audiobook includes: - Hypnosis for spiritual cleansing and detoxing - Healing music for deep relaxation You can free your mind from unwanted thoughts - and your heart from unwanted emotions. This session will help you press the "reset" button on your spirit so that you can heal, recharge, and revive your being. What listeners say about Spiritual Cleanse: Detox the Mind, Body and Spirit with HypnosisAverage customer ratings Reviews - Please select the tabs below to change the source of reviews. - Overall - Performance - Story - [Cassandra](/listener/amzn1.account.AFECPDSU3H7TR34YCICBMMUIHMCQ?ref=a_pd_Spirit_c15_rvlsnl_0&pf_rd_p=688a1b7e-3d44-49e7-a3fe-2be4c28264cd&pf_rd_r=X785A54TJ8SCCYCY27QD&pageLoadId=XwZCIeFVYyN0Ep5T&creativeId=88c226af-6ce7-461c-9842-163d82e49648) - 11-08-16 This was a purifying experience Any additional comments? This was a pleasant surprise. I wasn't really expecting much change in my attitude, but I felt lighter and happier after this hypnosis. It has a very mellow vibe that instantly relaxes you without too much effort. I enjoyed the narration and especially enjoyed the hypnosis. 87 people found this helpful - Overall - Performance - Story - [Ashley Landry](/listener/amzn1.account.AHMKBMFTZT5LVUORAV5BDFRJOR5A?ref=a_pd_Spirit_c15_rvlsnl_1&pf_rd_p=688a1b7e-3d44-49e7-a3fe-2be4c28264cd&pf_rd_r=X785A54TJ8SCCYCY27QD&pageLoadId=XwZCIeFVYyN0Ep5T&creativeId=88c226af-6ce7-461c-9842-163d82e49648) - 10-24-15 A weight lifted off my shoulders - a great listen What did you love best about Spiritual Cleanse: Detox the Mind, Body and Spirit with Hypnosis? From the start of the audiobook, I felt at ease. There is a meditative feel to this narration that helped calm me during the hypnosis. What was one of the most memorable moments of Spiritual Cleanse: Detox the Mind, Body and Spirit with Hypnosis? The actual hypnosis part was quite soothing. It felt as though my spiritual cache was being emptied. Quite a lovely feeling. I felt as though my brain waves changed, along with my attitude. My mood was relaxed immediately afterwards, and I felt a certain peace within me. What's an idea from the book that you will remember? I'll try to keep the peace I found while listening to this hypnosis. Although, I suspect I'll have to listen to it again when my soul requires some more winding down and detoxing. It's a shame such peaceful states don't last forever and you have to continuously work at it, because it feels amazing. 35 people found this helpful - Overall - Performance - Story - [Shari Ring Wolf](/listener/amzn1.account.AHHZNYQJFK4DK7HVA4U24WXXWKLQ?ref=a_pd_Spirit_c15_rvlsnl_2&pf_rd_p=688a1b7e-3d44-49e7-a3fe-2be4c28264cd&pf_rd_r=X785A54TJ8SCCYCY27QD&pageLoadId=XwZCIeFVYyN0Ep5T&creativeId=88c226af-6ce7-461c-9842-163d82e49648) - 12-14-15 beautiful and relaxing I really clicked with the visualization , I could feel it in my body by seeing it in my mind. after the visualization, there is 45 mins of music so you may want to set your timer. 3 people found this helpful - Overall - Performance - Story - [Webbersue](/listener/amzn1.account.AGM2VQKRRXDL444JQVEKDSW5AGHA?ref=a_pd_Spirit_c15_rvlsnl_3&pf_rd_p=688a1b7e-3d44-49e7-a3fe-2be4c28264cd&pf_rd_r=X785A54TJ8SCCYCY27QD&pageLoadId=XwZCIeFVYyN0Ep5T&creativeId=88c226af-6ce7-461c-9842-163d82e49648) - 02-03-17 I needed this loved it! it helped me open up and let all the bad out and let the good in. very healing 1 person found this helpful - Overall - Performance - Story - [Nancy B](/listener/amzn1.account.AFYNFWWQCZNJUYS46AO62POZQM4Q?ref=a_pd_Spirit_c15_rvlsnl_4&pf_rd_p=688a1b7e-3d44-49e7-a3fe-2be4c28264cd&pf_rd_r=X785A54TJ8SCCYCY27QD&pageLoadId=XwZCIeFVYyN0Ep5T&creativeId=88c226af-6ce7-461c-9842-163d82e49648) - 12-27-15 subliminal without telling you This book wasn't for you, but who do you think might enjoy it more? Seventeen minutes of hypnosis and then music that I didn't chose. Blah and irritating.. I don't like subliminal stuff and wouldn't have purchased it, had I known. What could Dr. William White have done to make this a more enjoyable book for you? A long hypnosis session would have been nice. I won't listen to it again. How did the narrator detract from the book? I liked her voice. She did fine it was the shortness of it and then creepy music. I wouldn't have purchased it if they had of presented the music only in the sample. Ripped off and angry - is how I feel instead of blissful and spiritually cleansed -it wasn't the narrators fault. If you could play editor, what scene or scenes would you have cut from Spiritual Cleanse: Detox the Mind, Body and Spirit with Hypnosis?
